name: Oven chicken wings
description: Much less oily alternative to fried chicken wings
instructions: - Prepare the spice mix, then preheat oven to 220ÂºC.
- Prepare the wings. If you bought them whole use a large knife and split them into drumstick, wings and tips, discarding or saving the tip in the freezer for other recipes.
- Pour oil in a pot, place the wings inside and get it into the oven for 22'.
- Take the wings out of the pot. Optionally drizzle it with a sauce done by glazing the pot with a splash of wine, a bit of butter and reducing it on the stove.
